attributes.action: Change the Law on Rape, so Men can report women for Rape not just Sexual Assualt
attributes.additional_details: It’s what’s right, people with out a penis can still rape those with a penis or with out. It’s about non concential sex, not the genitalia involved.
attributes.background: In the Law it says rape can’t be done unless it is penetrative by a penis, this means if a man is raped by a woman she can only be taken in for Sexual Assault. Rape is non consential sex of person to another person. This should be seen in the eyes of the law.
